subject: RE: Your monthly website care plan report has arrived! - https://helloworldtravelrevesby.com.au (mark.knox3@bigpond.com)

Hi Mark,

Confirming the plugins has been updated. LayerSlider WP is free when you have Avada license. :)

You can check available add ons here
https://helloworldtravelrevesby.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=avada-plugins

Hi Mark,

Thanks for confirming we have purchase the plugin for you and will update you once we have updated the plugins and theme.

The total is 69USD + 10.20GST = 79.20USD

Thanks Joel. Yes please go ahead with the Avada Theme license renewal.

Regards

Hi Mark,

I hope you're doing well.

Here's a breakdown of the plugins:
  • Avada Builder – This is part of the Avada theme and becomes available once we have a valid license.
  • Avada Core – Also part of the Avada theme, and requires the theme license to be activated.
  • Custom Facebook Feed Pro Business – We couldn’t locate any Facebook feed currently being used on the site. If it's not in use, we can go ahead and disable it. Can you send the page where this is located?
  • LayerSlider WP – We’re not 100% sure, but this plugin might also be available once the Avada theme is licensed.

We can purchase the Avada theme on your behalf and charge it to your account. Let me know if you'd like us to proceed—the cost is $69 USD.

Avada Theme on ThemeForest
@joel - once you have reviewed the plugins, lets discuss this before reply. Call me on slack.

Hi Joel, thanks for the update. The plugins listed below - are they crucial for what we do on the website? If yes, then how do we go about getting the licenses active?

Regards

Best Regards

Hi Mark,

I hope you're doing well.

Just confirming that the website has been updated. We're proceeding with caution since the site is a bit dated. To minimize any risk, we've been making updates in the staging environment before applying them to the live site.

There are a few plugins we weren't able to update, as they require active licenses or paid registrations:
  • Avada Builder
  • Avada Core
  • Custom Facebook Feed Pro Business
  • LayerSlider WP

@joel + @manuel - this is a similar experience to what Novari reported when they logged in.
https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/2896418287/149745

Can we figure out where the breakdown in process is?

Once we know, @cindy can help get into ClickUp.

Thanks for that. Janelle (Store Manager) was just asking me how she wants to make some changes and was frustrated by the amount of updates that need to be done when she logs in. I noted this morning with her that there are 16 updates required. Now this could be just shitty timing that they all came in yesterday, however, I can see Janelle's concerns. Can you guys look into this and provide any feedback/observations.

Thanks

Best Regards,
